title: About me
text:
Hi! I am Isidora Araya Day, a theoretical condensed matter physicist working on mesoscopic physics, topology and quantum transport.
Currently, I am a PhD student in the Quantum Tinkerer group at TU Delft, working with Anton Akhmerov and Michael Wimmer.

title: About me
text:

Mesoscopic superconductivity


Topological phases of matter
